post_write_code.command: powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "$f = if ($env:WINDSURF_FILE_PATH) { $env:WINDSURF_FILE_PATH } else { $null }; if ($f -and ($f -match '\.rs$') -and (Test-Path $f)) { cargo fmt --quiet -- $f 2>$null; $lines = (Get-Content $f | Measure-Object -Line).Lines; if ($lines -gt 500) { Write-Host ('[!] ' + (Split-Path $f -Leaf) + ' = ' + $lines + ' lignes (> 500)') -ForegroundColor Yellow } else { Write-Host ('[ok] Formatted: ' + (Split-Path $f -Leaf)) -ForegroundColor Green } }"
